mapper.sql: select a.*, sdoc.subject "sdoc_subject", org.label "org_label", person.label "person_label", dest.*, shipper.label "shipper_label", cat.label "cat_label", phase.label "phase_label", u.label "uid_label", g.label "gid_label" from dldoc a left join sdoc on a.sdoc=sdoc.id left join org on a.org=org.id left join person on a.person=person.id left join avct_contact dest on a.shipdest=dest.ct__id left join org shipper on a.shipper=shipper.id left join cat on a.cat=cat.id left join phase on a.phase=phase.id left join "user" u on a.uid=u.id left join "group" g on a.gid=g.id

select a.*, sdoc.subject "sdoc_subject", org.label "org_label", person.label "person_label", dest.*, shipper.label "shipper_label", cat.label "cat_label", phase.label "phase_label", u.label "uid_label", g.label "gid_label" from dldoc a left join sdoc on a.sdoc=sdoc.id left join org on a.org=org.id left join person on a.person=person.id left join avct_contact dest on a.shipdest=dest.ct__id left join org shipper on a.shipper=shipper.id left join cat on a.cat=cat.id left join phase on a.phase=phase.id left join "user" u on a.uid=u.id left join "group" g on a.gid=g.id left join dlentry y on a.id=y.doc
mapper.select: insert into dldoc( priority, flags, state, uid, gid, mode, acl, t0, t1, op, subject, text, form, args, cat, phase, prev, sdoc, org, person, shipdest, shipper, shipment, shipcost, qty, total ) values( #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{owner.id}, #{ownerGroup.id}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{op.id}, #{subject}, #{text}, #{form.id}, #{formArgs}, #{category.id}, #{phase.id}, #{previous.id}, #{salesOrder.id}, #{org.id}, #{person.id}, #{shipDest.id}, #{shipper.id}, #{shipmentId}, #{shippingCost}, #{quantity}, #{total} ) returning id
